docs.text: this lovestory is situated in a small town in the rough dreary cliffs in the vestern part of scotland in the 1970 something .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the church ( calvinistic ) is so strict that the church bells has been removed from the clocktower , they are considered being too unrestrained .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in these surroundings we find the to-be-weds jan and bess , played by stellan skarsgaard and the remarkable new movie actress emily watson .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: jan is on leave from the oilrig and bess . .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: is just bess , a bit naive and innocent ( in every aspect of the word ) , at first .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: at the wedding party we are told an anecdote , illustrating her infinite kindness , she once lend a bike to an stranger , her best friends bike however .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but bess is suffering in this scary religious society .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: we soon take part in a funeral where a man , fallen off the orthodox path , is laid to rest while doomed to hell .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: women are not allowed to attend funerals or speak up in the church .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: when the end of the honeymoon approaches we see bess idolizing jan in such an intend , almost manic , that her friends try to calm her down a bit .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the time has come when jan is to return to the rig , bess is falling into the darkness of depression , her yelling of grief and sorrow are heard above the breaking of the waves .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she can't stand the thought of life without her husband .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: we witness her dialogues with god ( she speaks both parts , paranoia ? )
docs.label: positive

docs.text: convincing god to return jan from the oilrig , and her prayers are heard .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: an accident on the rig bring him back , paralysed from the neck and down .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: now he can't satisfy her need for physical love , he try to persuade her into finding a lover , with the ulterior motive to make her describe these affairs to him in every detail .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: at first she resist , but her love for jan and his assurance that this will make him recover more rapidly make her comply .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: imagine what this is doing to the poor girl ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the story is cleverly divided into eight chapters parted by beautiful pictures made by danish artist per kirkeby , accompanied by music from the era ; procol harum , deep purple , t-rex and others .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the use of hand-held camera and lack of any make-up make the characters solid and help to separate this movie from others in the sentimental genre .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the incredible performance from the actors makes the movie brilliant , though a bit too gloomy for my taste .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i would say that it is in the genre of betty blue ( 37 . 2 le matin ) and bitter moon ( lunes de fiel ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: emily watson as bess and katrin cartlidge as her best friend dodo deliver outstanding performances , this must be the reason for giving it the " grand prix du jury " in cannes this year ( although we had hoped for the " palme d'or " ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the screenplay is now available in print , the transformation being made in the period from ultimo may to july , just in time for the danish premiere .
docs.label: positive
